title: Create pricing plans interface with static PIX QR code payment

requirements.summary: Create pricing plans page with subscription tier cards displaying features and pricing
acceptanceCriteria: Pricing plans page accessible from home page navigation
Each plan displayed as a distinct card with clear visual hierarchy
Plan details include price, benefits list, and feature comparison
Cards are responsive and work on mobile devices

file_operations.description: Create the pricing plans page component that displays subscription tiers (Basic, Premium, etc.) as visually distinct cards. Each card should show the plan name, price in BRL, a list of benefits/features, and visual hierarchy using Tailwind CSS and shadcn/ui Card components. Include responsive grid layout that works on mobile devices. Use Portuguese for all text content following the existing translations pattern.

Add Portuguese translations for pricing page content including plan names (Basic, Premium, etc.), plan descriptions, pricing labels, feature lists, payment section headings, and any instructional text needed for the pricing interface.
Register the new /pricing route in the router configuration. Import PricingPage component and add it to the routes array so users can navigate to the pricing plans page.

Add a navigation link to the pricing page in the header navigation menu. Include appropriate label in Portuguese (e.g., 'Planos') and ensure it's accessible to both authenticated and unauthenticated users since pricing is public information.

requirements.summary: Display static PIX QR code image with email key on pricing page
acceptanceCriteria: QR code displayed as a static image on pricing plans page
QR code is clearly visible and scannable on mobile devices
Email key 'proj.defdriver+pagbank@gmail.com' is shown as text alongside QR code
Payment instructions in Portuguese are displayed near the QR code

file_operations.description: Add a payment section to the pricing page that displays the static PIX QR code image located at frontend/public/assets/generated/pix-qr-code.dim_400x400.png. The QR code should be rendered at an appropriate size for mobile scanning (minimum 300px). Display the PIX key email 'proj.defdriver+pagbank@gmail.com' as copyable text below the QR code. Use a visually prominent section with clear spacing and borders to draw attention to the payment method.

Add Portuguese translations for PIX payment section including labels like 'Pagamento via PIX', 'Chave PIX (Email)', 'Escaneie o QR Code', and any other payment-related labels needed to display the QR code and email key clearly.

requirements.summary: Add PIX payment instructions explaining how to complete the transaction
acceptanceCriteria: Clear step-by-step payment instructions in Portuguese
Instructions include how to scan QR code and verify payment details
Contact information or support guidance for payment issues is provided

file_operations.description: Add a payment instructions section below or near the QR code that provides step-by-step guidance in Portuguese for completing a PIX payment. Include instructions for: (1) opening the banking app, (2) selecting PIX payment option, (3) scanning the QR code or copying the email key, (4) verifying payment details (amount and recipient), (5) confirming the transaction. Add a support/contact section with guidance for users who encounter payment issues or need assistance. Use an ordered list or numbered steps for clarity, with appropriate visual styling using Tailwind CSS.

Add comprehensive Portuguese translations for payment instructions including step labels, instruction text for each step (scanning QR code, verifying details, confirming payment), support/contact information headings, and any disclaimers or important notes about manual payment verification.
